registry.title: IANA-ENTITY-MIB
registry.description:
This MIB module defines a Textual Convention that provides an indication of the general hardware type of a particular physical entity.
Copyright (C) The IETF Trust (2013).
The initial version of this MIB module was published in RFC-ietf-eman-rfc4133bis-06; for full legal notices see the RFC itself. Supplementary information may be available at:
http://www.ietf.org/copyrights/ianamib.html
